    • appendBehaviour

      protected void appendBehaviour(com.almasb.fxgl.texture.Texture t)
      Description copied from class: SeeReservedAbstract
      Adds behaviour to object t, specifically made for see Own reserved. This should allow opening a buy prompt.
      Specified by:
      appendBehaviour in class SeeReservedAbstract
      Parameters:
      t - the texture to which the behaviour will be added.

    • promptOpened

      protected void promptOpened()
      Description copied from class: SeeReservedAbstract
      If others reserved card then hiddenCards = 0 and need to append behaviour else hiddenCards >= 0 and no need to add behaviour. Note that this will throw an exception if the number of cards total, hiddenCards + (number of textures in viewAbleCards) is greater than 3.
      Specified by:
      promptOpened in class SeeReservedAbstract
